Package SC2002.ProjectOLD

Class User

java.lang.Object
SC2002.ProjectOLD.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Applicant, HDB_Manager
public abstract class User extends Object
IMPORTANT: All subclasses must use the standardized input methods defined in Input.java: - Input.getStringInput(Scanner sc) - Input.getIntInput(Scanner sc) instead of calling Scanner's nextLine(), nextInt(), etc., directly.
